::Cledar::

The grenade blast blew Cledar backward, but he jumps back to his feet.

"Ha! And don't come back!" he yells after Sinnertwin, firing a plasma
beam at him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry Yan, I am still getting used to the new rules.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> The Plasma nailed Sinnertwin, forcing his massive body down to the
> ground. He started to drool oil with anticipation of this feast, but
> noticed Astroblast pulling out. He transformed, and fired one
grenade at
> Cledar, then began to fly away.
